## Connector.EndShapeConnectionSiteIndex property

Returns or sets the index of connection site for end shape. Read/write UInt32.

```csharp
public uint EndShapeConnectionSiteIndex { get; set; }
```

### Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentException | Thrown when value is less than EndShapeConnectedTo.ConnectionSiteCount |
